subdisciplines.name: Trait Theory
subdisciplines.description: The study of individual differences in personality characteristics and how they relate to behavior and outcomes.

subdisciplines.name: Social-cognitive Theory
subdisciplines.description: The study of how people learn, structure, and use information in the social world as part of their personality development.

subdisciplines.name: Humanistic Theory
subdisciplines.description: The study of how individuals perceive and understand themselves and their world, and how they strive towards self-actualization and personal growth.
